Get ESPN NBA's Betting information

Source: R/espn_nba_data.R
espn_nba_betting.Rd

Get ESPN NBA's Betting information

espn_nba_betting(game_id)

Arguments

game_id

Game ID

Examples

# \donttest{
espn_nba_betting(game_id = 401283399)

#> [[1]]
